entities.name: variable
entities.description: Represents a variable in GCD+ programming language
entities.usage: Used for storing and manipulating data

entities.name: function
entities.usage: Used for grouping code and reusable logic
entities.example: function add(a, b) { return a + b; }

entities.name: class
entities.usage: Used for creating objects and organizing code

entities.name: loop
entities.description: Represents a loop structure in GCD+
entities.usage: Used for iterating over a sequence of code
entities.example: for (var i = 0; i < 5; i++) { // code to repeat }
